ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To serve as a pre-built, customizable UI template for developers creating Point of Sale (POS) applications, particularly for restaurants, using Flutter.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Modern and responsive UI design â€¢ Side navigation menu with animated selections â€¢ Food category filtering â€¢ Product grid view with images and pricing â€¢ Order management system
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a modern, responsive, and visually appealing UI for a Point of Sale (POS) application built with Flutter. It showcases features like product browsing, order management, and a clean order summary, ideal for restaurant systems.

ðŸ’¡ Mockoops | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Creating animated marketing or tutorial videos from screen recordings using pre-designed templates.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Superfast rendering powered by Serverless Functions â€¢ Real-time preview updates â€¢ Responsive Video Templates â€¢ Multiple pre-built templates for various scenarios â€¢ Long-term Caching for rendering optimization
ðŸ“– Summary: Mockoops is a JavaScript-based tool that transforms boring screen recordings into beautiful, animated mockups in seconds. It leverages React and serverless functions for fast rendering, offering responsive video templates and efficient caching.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ chat-downloader | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To download and archive chat messages from online video content for analysis, record-keeping, or other purposes.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Retrieve chat messages from livestreams, videos, clips, and past broadcasts â€¢ Supports multiple platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch) â€¢ No authentication required â€¢ Command-line interface (CLI) with extensive options â€¢ Python library for programmatic use
ðŸ“– Summary: Chat Downloader is a Python tool that retrieves chat messages from various online video platforms like YouTube and Twitch. It supports livestreams, videos, clips, and past broadcasts, and operates without requiring user authentication.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ telegram-files | Java
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automated and continuous downloading of files from Telegram, managed through a self-hosted web interface.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Seamless file downloads from Telegram channels and groups â€¢ Support for multiple Telegram accounts â€¢ Pause and resume downloads â€¢ Automatic file transfer to designated destinations â€¢ Instant preview of downloaded videos and images
ðŸ“– Summary: Telegram Files is a self-hosted application designed for continuous, stable, and unattended downloading of files from Telegram channels and groups. It supports multiple Telegram accounts, allows pausing and resuming downloads, and offers features like instant previews and PWA support.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ subtrackr | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Self-hosted subscription tracking and financial management.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Dashboard Overview with real-time stats â€¢ Subscription Management with logos â€¢ Calendar View with iCal export â€¢ Analytics for spending by category â€¢ Email and Pushover Notifications for renewals
ðŸ“– Summary: SubTrackr is a self-hosted subscription management application built with Go and HTMX. It allows users to track their subscriptions, visualize spending habits, receive renewal reminders, and manage their finances effectively.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ mirrow | Swift
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Detecting and terminating malicious or suspicious overlay applications on macOS.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Intelligent Detection of suspicious overlay applications â€¢ Risk Scoring for detected applications â€¢ Real-time System Monitoring â€¢ Automatic Filtering of legitimate macOS applications â€¢ One-Click Termination of suspicious apps
ðŸ“– Summary: Mirror is a macOS security tool written in Swift that detects and neutralizes suspicious overlay applications. It scans active windows, identifies potentially malicious apps based on characteristics like hidden layers or transparency, and allows for one-click termination.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source
